fitzgen commented on Issue #1692:

Crap, forgot that the reference types changes mean that we need to update the test suite as well.

fitzgen commented on Issue #1692:

The latest commit temporarily vendors the updated bulk-memory tests that handle ref.null <type> introduced in the latest ref types updates. However, we're not going to commit this. Instead, @sunfishcode has volunteered to update the upstream, aggregated spec tests so that they have these changes. Thanks Dan!

fitzgen commented on Issue #1692:

Instead, @sunfishcode has volunteered to update the upstream, aggregated spec tests so that they have these changes.

This is done now, and the submodule is updated in the latest commit.
